sourcesContent:
import akvsak from '../images/akvsak.jpg';
import alive from '../images/alive.jpg';
import allofusaredead from '../images/allofusaredead.jpeg'
import annabelle from '../images/annabelle.jpg'
import batmanvssuperman from '../images/batmanvssuperman.jpg'
import bloodshot from '../images/bloodshot.jpg'
import bullettrain from '../images/bullettrain.jpg'
import chennaiexpress from '../images/chennaiexpress.jpg'
import extraction from '../images/extraction.jpg'
import gangubai from '../images/gangubai.jpg'
import jumanji from '../images/jumanji.jpg'
import kotafactory from '../images/kotafactory.jpg'
import ludo from '../images/ludo.jpg'
import major from '../images/major.jpg'
import manofsteel from '../images/manofsteel.jpg'
import manvsbee from '../images/manvsbee.jpg'
import masabamasaba from '../images/masabamasaba.jpg'
import peakyblinders from '../images/peakyblinders.jpg'
import projectpower from '../images/projectpower.jpg'
import rednotice from '../images/rednotice.jpg'
import rrr from '../images/rrr.jpg'
import sanandreas from '../images/sanandreas.jpg'
import sexeducation from '../images/sexeducation.jpg'
import strangerthings from '../images/strangerthings.jpg'
import tenet from '../images/tenet.jpg'
import theadamproject from '../images/theadamproject.jpg'
import theamazingspiderman from '../images/theamazingspiderman.jpg'
import thegrayman from '../images/thegrayman.jpg'
import thekaratekid from '../images/thekaratekid.jpg'
import themummy from '../images/themummy.jpg'
import wednesday from '../images/wednesday.jpg'


const Menu = [
    {
        id:1,
        image: akvsak,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Ak vs Ak",
        category:"Drama",
        rating:"6.9",
        context:"After a public spat with a movie star, a disgraced director retaliates by kidnapping the actor's daughter and films the search for her in real time.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/in/title/81227759"
    },
    {
        id:2,
        image: alive,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"#Alive",
        category:"Thriller",
        rating:"6.3",
        context:"While a grisly virus ravages a Korean city, Joon-woo tries to stay safe by locking himself inside his apartment. Just as he loses hope, he discovers another survivor.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/in/title/81240831"
    },
    {
        id:3,
        image: allofusaredead,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"All of us are dead",
        category:"Drama",
        rating:"7.5",
        context:"Trapped students must escape their high school which has become ground zero for a zombie virus outbreak.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/81237994"
    },
    {
        id:4,
        image: annabelle,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Annabelle",
        category:"Horror",
        rating:"6.5",
        context:"Samuel and Elle embed their daughter's spirit into a doll, only to realise it is a demon. Years later, they open their home to a nun and six orphan girls, one of whom finds the doll.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/ch-en/title/80158661"
    },
    {
        id:5,
        image:batmanvssuperman,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Batman vs Superman",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"6.4",
        context:"Bruce Wayne, a billionaire, believes that Superman is a threat to humanity after his battle in Metropolis. Thus, he decides to adopt his mantle of Batman and defeat him once and for all.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/in/title/80081793"
    },
    {
        id:6,
        image: bloodshot,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Bloodshot",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"5.7",
        context:"Ray Garrison, an elite soldier killed in battle, is resurrected and given superhuman abilities. As he sets out to get revenge, he uncovers secrets about his life and the people supposedly helping him.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/in/title/81171201"
    },
    {
        id:7,
        image: bullettrain,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Bullet Train",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"7.3",
        context:"Ladybug is an unlucky assassin who's determined to do his job peacefully after one too many gigs has gone off the rails. Fate, however, may have other plans as his latest mission puts him on a collision course with lethal adversaries from around the globe -- all with connected yet conflicting objectives -- on the world's fastest train.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/in/title/81511779"
    },
    {
        id:8,
        image: chennaiexpress,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Chennai Express",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"6.0",
        context:"Rahul, a young man, sets out to immerse his late grandfather's ashes at Rameshwaram. However, when he helps Meena, a runaway bride, board a train, he has to face the ire of her criminal family.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/70254350"
    },
    {
        id:9,
        image: extraction,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Extraction",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"6.7",
        context:"A black-market mercenary who has nothing to lose is hired to rescue the kidnapped son of an imprisoned international crime lord. But in the murky underworld of weapons dealers and drug traffickers, an already deadly mission approaches the impossible.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/80230399"
    },
    {
        id:10,
        image: gangubai,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Gangubai Kathiawadi",
        category:"Drama",
        rating:"7.8",
        context:"After being duped and sold to a brothel, a young woman takes control of the world she was once a pawn in, utilising her underworld connections to rule it.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/81280352"
    },
    {
        id:11,
        image: jumanji,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Jumanji",
        category:"Comedy",
        rating:"6.9",
        context:"When four students play with a magical video game, they are drawn to the jungle world of Jumanji, where they are trapped as their avatars. To return to the real world, they must finish the game.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/in/title/80192646"
    },
    {
        id:12,
        image:kotafactory,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Kota Factory",
        category:"Drama",
        rating:"9.0",
        context:"Like many students from across India, Vaibhav comes to Kota to prepare for JEE and NEET. Along with his friends, he navigates campus life and works hard to get into IIT.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/81249783"
    },
    {
        id:13,
        image: ludo,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Ludo",
        category:"Drama",
        rating:"7.6",
        context:"Four seemingly different stories intertwine in a game of fate and chance that includes a scandalous sex tape, a suitcase full of money and unsettled scores.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/81107576"
    },
    {
        id:14,
        image: major,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Major",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"8.2",
        context:"Major Sandeep Unnikrishnan faces his biggest battle when he joins the task force to save the occupants at the Taj Hotel attacked by a terrorist group.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/81242574"
    },
    {
        id:15,
        image: manofsteel,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Man of Steel",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"7.1",
        context:"Clark learns about the source of his abilities and his real home when he enters a Kryptonian ship in the Artic. However, an old enemy follows him to Earth in search of a codex and brings destruction.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/in/title/70264797"
    },
    {
        id:16,
        image: manvsbee,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Man vs Bee",
        category:"Comedy",
        rating:"6.7",
        context:"A homeless man looking for work is mistaken by a business woman for her new house sitter. Wacky hi-jinks ensue as he tries to take care of this house while pursued by a mischievous bee.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/81222715"
    },
    {
        id:17,
        image:masabamasaba,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Masaba Masaba",
        category:"Drama",
        rating:"6.7",
        context:"Fashion designer Masaba Gupta straddles the worlds of fashion and family while making a foray back into the dating world.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/81122196"
    },
    {
        id:18,
        image: peakyblinders,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Peaky Blinders",
        category:"Drama",
        rating:"8.8",
        context:"Tommy Shelby, a dangerous man, leads the Peaky Blinders, a gang based in Birmingham. Soon, Chester Campbell, an inspector, decides to nab him and put an end to the criminal activities.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/80002479"
    },
    {
        id:19,
        image: projectpower,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Project Power",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"6.0",
        context:"A former soldier teams up with a cop to find the source behind a dangerous pill that provides temporary, unpredictable superpowers.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/80204465"
    },
    {
        id:20,
        image: rednotice,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Red Notice",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"6.3",
        context:"In the world of international crime, an Interpol agent attempts to hunt down and capture the world's most wanted art thief.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/81161626"
    },
    {
        id:21,
        image: rrr,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"RRR",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"7.9",
        context:"A fearless revolutionary and an officer in the British force, who once shared a deep bond, decide to join forces and chart out an inspirational path of freedom against the despotic rulers.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/81476453"
    },
    {
        id:22,
        image: sanandreas,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"San Andreas",
        category:"Thriller",
        rating:"6.1",
        context:"Following a massive earthquake, Ray, a rescue-chopper pilot, and his estranged wife try to find and save their daughter before another disaster strikes.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/80027980"
    },
    {
        id:23,
        image: sexeducation,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Sex Education",
        category:"Drama",
        rating:"8.3",
        context:"Socially awkward high school student Otis may not have much experience in the lovemaking department, but he gets good guidance on the topic in his personal sex ed course -- living with mom Jean, who is a sex therapist. Being surrounded by manuals, videos and tediously open conversations about sex, Otis has become a reluctant expert on the subject.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/80197526"
    },
    {
        id:24,
        image: strangerthings,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Stranger Things",
        category:"Drama",
        rating:"8.7",
        context:"In 1980s Indiana, a group of young friends witness supernatural forces and secret government exploits. As they search for answers, the children unravel a series of extraordinary mysteries.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/80057281"
    },
    {
        id:25,
        image: tenet,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Tenet",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"7.3",
        context:"When a few objects that can be manipulated and used as weapons in the future fall into the wrong hands, a CIA operative, known as the Protagonist, must save the world.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/in/title/81198930"
    },
    {
        id:26,
        image: theadamproject,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"The Adam Project",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"6.7",
        context:"Time-travelling fighter pilot Adam Reed teams up with his 12-year-old self for a mission to save the future after unintentionally crash landing in 2022.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/in/title/81309354"
    },
    {
        id:27,
        image: theamazingspiderman,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"The Amazing Spiderman",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"6.9",
        context:"Peter Parker, an outcast high school student, gets bitten by a radioactive spider and attains superpowers. Soon, he is forced to use his abilities to fight a monstrous foe. teams up with his 12-year-old self for a mission to save the future after unintentionally crash landing in 2022.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/in/title/70208599"
    },
    {
        id:28,
        image: thegrayman,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"The Gray Man",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"6.5",
        context:"When the CIA's top asset -- his identity known to no one -- uncovers agency secrets, he triggers a global hunt by assassins set loose by his ex-colleague.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/81160697"
    },
    {
        id:29,
        image: thekaratekid,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"The Karate Kid",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"6.2",
        context:"Dre, a young boy, finds himself bullied by Cheng, a rebellious kung fu prodigy at his school. However, things change after he befriends Mr Han, a maintenance man, who happens to be a kung fu expert.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/in/title/70125931"
    },
    {
        id:30,
        image: themummy,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"The Mummy",
        category:"Action",
        rating:"5.4",
        context:"After Sergeant Nick and Corporal Chris call an air strike on an enemy stronghold, they stumble upon the tomb of Princess Ahmanet. The princess is set free and Nick has to fight for his life.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/tr-en/title/80161352"
    },
    {
        id:31,
        image: wednesday,
        description:"NETFLIX ORIGINALS",
        name:"Wednesday",
        category:"Comedy",
        rating:"8.2",
        context:"While attending Nevermore Academy, Wednesday Addams attempts to master her emerging psychic ability, thwart a killing spree and solve the mystery that embroiled her parents 25 years ago.",
        link:"https://www.netflix.com/title/81231974"
    },
    
];
export default Menu;
